mapper.select: SELECT * FROM HANJU_PRODUCT P INNER JOIN HANJU_CODE C ON P.TYPE = C.CODE INNER JOIN HANJU_NORMAL_SELL N ON P.PRODUCT_ID = N.PRODUCT_ID WHERE N.SELL_ID = #{sellId}
SELECT * FROM HANJU_PRODUCT P INNER JOIN HANJU_NORMAL_SELL N ON P.PRODUCT_ID = N.PRODUCT_ID WHERE N.SELL_ID = #{sellId}

SELECT * FROM HANJU_PRODUCT P INNER JOIN HANJU_CODE C ON P.TYPE = C.CODE INNER JOIN HANJU_PICKUP_STOCK S ON P.PRODUCT_ID = S.PRODUCT_ID INNER JOIN HANJU_PICKUP_STORE S2 ON S.STORE_ID = S2.STORE_ID WHERE P.PRODUCT_ID = #{pickupId}
SELECT * FROM HANJU_PRODUCT P INNER JOIN HANJU_CODE C ON P.TYPE = C.CODE INNER JOIN HANJU_GROUP_SELL G ON P.PRODUCT_ID = G.PRODUCT_ID WHERE G.GROUP_SELL_ID = #{groupId}

SELECT COUNT(*) AS CURRENT_AMOUNT FROM HANJU_GROUP_SELL_STAT S INNER JOIN HANJU_GROUP_SELL G ON G.GROUP_SELL_ID = S.GROUP_SELL_ID INNER JOIN HANJU_PRODUCT P ON P.PRODUCT_ID = G.PRODUCT_ID INNER JOIN HANJU_CODE C ON P.TYPE = C.CODE WHERE G.GROUP_SELL_ID = #{groupId}

SELECT FILE_PATH FROM HANJU_IMAGE I INNER JOIN HANJU_PRODUCT P ON I.FK_ID = P.PRODUCT_ID LEFT JOIN HANJU_NORMAL_SELL N ON P.PRODUCT_ID = N.PRODUCT_ID LEFT JOIN HANJU_GROUP_SELL G ON P.PRODUCT_ID = G.PRODUCT_ID WHERE (N.SELL_ID = #{sellId} AND FILE_STATUS = #{status}) OR (P.PRODUCT_ID = #{pickupId} AND FILE_STATUS = #{status}) OR (G.GROUP_SELL_ID = #{groupId} AND FILE_STATUS = #{status})

SELECT c.*,replace(user_name, substr(user_name, 2, 1), '*') user_name, i.* FROM HANJU_COMMENT C INNER JOIN HANJU_USER U ON C.USER_ID = U.USER_ID LEFT JOIN HANJU_IMAGE I ON I.FK_ID = C.COMMENT_ID WHERE (C.BILL_ID = #{sellId}) OR (C.BILL_ID = #{pickupId})

SELECT S.SUBSCRIBE_ID, S.TITLE, S.DISCOUNT, S.CDATETIME, S.ARRIVE_DATE, P.PRICE FROM HANJU_SUBSCRIBE S INNER JOIN (SELECT S.SUBSCRIBE_ID,SUM(P.PRICE) PRICE FROM HANJU_SUBSCRIBE S INNER JOIN HANJU_SUBSCRIBE_ITEM SI ON SI.SUBSCRIBE_ID = S.SUBSCRIBE_ID INNER JOIN HANJU_PRODUCT P ON P.PRODUCT_ID = SI.PRODUCT_ID GROUP BY S.SUBSCRIBE_ID) P ON P.SUBSCRIBE_ID = S.SUBSCRIBE_ID WHERE S.SUBSCRIBE_ID = #{subId}

SELECT * FROM HANJU_SUBSCRIBE_ITEM SI INNER JOIN HANJU_PRODUCT HP ON HP.PRODUCT_ID = SI.PRODUCT_ID INNER JOIN HANJU_IMAGE HI ON HI.FK_ID = HP.PRODUCT_ID WHERE SI.SUBSCRIBE_ID = #{subId} AND HI.FILE_STATUS = 'T'
